OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This VIP is used to create sub orders for members and groups. Change the field mappings from Member to Service Account in MemberToServiceAccount component.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: CreateSubOrders

omniProcessElements.name: CreateSubOrder
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "AccountId" : "%AccountId%", "GroupId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%Member:GroupId%),%Member:GroupId%,%Group:GroupId%)", "LineItems" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%Member:LineItems%),LIST(%Member:LineItems%),LIST(%Group:LineItems%))", "MasterOrderId" : "%MasterOrderId%", "MemberId" : "%Member:Id%", "ObjectType" : "%ObjectType%", "RecordTypeId" : "%SORecordTypeId%", "ServiceAccountId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%Member:ServiceAccountId%),%Member:ServiceAccountId%,%SearchOrCreateServiceAccount:recordId%)", "SourceObjectId" : "%SourceObjectId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { "RecordId" : "%CreateSubOrder:OrderId%" }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "createOrder", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : true, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SearchOrCreateServiceAccount
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "AccountId" : "%AccountId%", "FieldMap" : "%MemberToServiceAccount%", "MemberId" : "%Member:Id%", "ObjectType" : "%ObjectType%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%Member%) && ISBLANK(%Member:ServiceAccountId%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "checkForExistingServiceAccount", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: UpdateQuantity
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "GroupId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%Member:GroupId%),%Member:GroupId%,%Group:GroupId%)", "ObjectItemType" : "=IF(%ObjectType% == 'Order','OrderItem','QuoteLineItem')", "SubOrderId" : "%CreateSubOrder:RecordId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%Member:GroupId%) || ISNOTBLANK(%Group:GroupId%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_UpdateQuantityAndPrice", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction3", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
